articles.title: The Harvard scientist, Kim Kardashian and the comet that probably isn’t an alien spaceship
articles.description:
Scientists who study comets are struggling to keep up with popular speculation that the interstellar object 3I/ATLAS was sent to our solar system by an alien intelligence.

The post The Harvard scientist, Kim Kardashian and the comet that probably isn’t an alien spaceship appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Harvard scientist Avi Loeb addresses alien speculation about comet 3I/ATLAS in Boston.
Comet 3I/ATLAS, discovered in 2019, has sparked widespread public interest and debate.
Local scientists urge Boston residents to focus on scientific evidence over sensational claims.
